name: Utsukushii Koibito
description:
~Utsukushii Koibito~

This is a short visual novel I created for the Sunofes jam. 

You play as Murasaki, or the player can choose a name.  A non-binary cafe server, who is very lonely and very bored of their life, at least until they find a little something a customer accidently left behind.

This is a spinoff of my main series of characters. 

I will openly admit, there may be spelling errors. So, this is more of an early access of the game. I will probably keep updating it some in the future. Fix spelling errors and add some ending/more images in game. Also, this was my first attempt at making a VN. I created this little story, all the art and started learning the VN engine all in the two months since this jam has started. 

Credits:

Music by MonkeyKidGC

Art, Story and Characters was done by me.
